sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Converts a breakdown that has (facts_table,field,scripted,script) values to the new situation where these values are stored in the pa_breakdown_mappings table instead. </description> <name>PA Breakdown Mappings</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (SNC && SNC.PABreakdownMapping) { var pa = new SNC.PABreakdownMapping(); pa.fix(); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-03-04 06:34:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6b47ec52eb223100871aac6aa206febf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PA Breakdown Mappings</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">4069fc643cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6b47ec52eb223100871aac6aa206febf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-03-04 06:34:22</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
